meanings.definition: More attractive or pleasing in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden looked comelier after the rain.
meanings.sent2: She thought the new dress was comelier than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The comelier cupcakes were gone in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: The comelier sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The comelier smile on her face brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: The comelier weather made the picnic even more enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: The comelier music helped everyone relax at the gathering.
meanings.sent3: The comelier scent of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The comelier atmosphere of the park invited people to linger longer.
meanings.sent5: The comelier taste of the homemade soup warmed their hearts.
